main_section:
Buying on ShopChemical is very simple. 


One of our team will contact you once you complete the purchase procedure online.


you have to update him with the payment details. 


We accept cash/cheque/wire transfer


No post dated cheque is accepted as we are giving law bottom price to support you.


for more assistance call 44 627 300
name: buying-on-shopchemical
title: Buying On ShopChemical

main_section:
DELIVERY AND RETURNS POLICY

DELIVERY

The Minimum order for delivery is KD 10 for all areas.
Promotional Items will only be delivered if more than half of shopping cart value is from non-promotional items.
Orders placed will be delivered within 4 hours after the order has been finalized and scanned, or at a time preferred by the customer after this 4 hour period has passed.
Last in day delivery order will be accepted until 6pm, after this time, any orders placed will be delivered the next day at a time specified by the customer.
Delivery times are available between 8:00 am - 10:00 pm
Payment is required at the time of delivery.
Payment can be made by CASH, KNET or CREDIT CARD

RETURNS

Customers can return any item at the time of delivery, with the driver and will not be charged for the respective item(s).
For items the customer wishes to return after this point:

INVOICE/TILL RECEIPT

Please keep your invoice and till receipt for proof of purchase.  No exchange or refund will be considered without it.

SEVEN DAYS MONEY BACK GUARANTEE

Provided that the merchandise is complete with box and packaging, and in a re-saleable condition.

FAULTY PRODUCT

If the product is found defective after one week of purchase, the item will be collected for repair only (NO EXCHANGE).
The product will be looked after through the supplier service center.

NO REFUND OR EXCHANGE

title: Contact Us

main_section:
About Us


ChemTech is headquartered in Qatar, with regional hubs in UAE, Oman, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia and India.


Each region is served by an extensive distribution network offering a range of chemical products and chemical related services.


Our service includes chemical distribution, Transportation and Logistics.


We welcome all the manufactures to join with us and reach end user without much hurdles.

We have taken all possible steps to provide quality products and services at a very reasonable price through our e-commerce website www.shopchemical.com


Thanks for visiting our website and doing business with us.



Surej

ShopChemical.com

Chemically yours
